minSeverity.description:
The minimum severity that will be reported. The differences with lesser severity will not \
                             be reported.

output.description:
The value is a path to file to which write the report. 2 special values are recognized: \
                             out: the report is written to standard output, \
                             err: the report is written to standard error output.

template.description:
The path to a Freemarker template file to use for outputting the report. If not given a \
                            default template is used.
